txt.en: This necklace is encrusted with grime and filth, but it glows with a radiance that shines through the stains.\n\nAfter wiping off some of the dirt, you can see that it is an Elf-necklace made by a skilled hand. You should bring it to Ladenthir in Echad Eregion. He may be able to shed more light on its origin.

'You did well bringing me this treasure. It is a relic of the Second Age of this world, made by a smith of the Noldor...its beauty could be mistaken for no other craftsman's work.\n\n'I will send this treasure to Rivendell. Maybe there, Master Elrond can identify the exact smith who wrought it, and it can be cleaned and restored by Elves of his household; though doubtless it will never be restored to its full glory after its long neglect and mistreatment by the servants of Saruman.'
One of the half-orcs of Barad Morlas was carrying an ornate necklace, you should return it to Ladenthir.
Bring the necklace to Ladenthir in Echad Eregion
Ladenthir is in Echad Eregion, south of High Hollin.\n\nYou should bring the necklace to Ladenthir for further inspection.
